articles.author: Michael Janda
articles.title: ASX adds around $60 billion after cooling inflation drives Wall Street buying frenzy - ABC News
articles.description: Australian shares jump, following a surge on the major US share indices, as American inflation figures came in weaker than expected lowering interest rate rise expectations.
articles.content:
Australian shares are surging, after weaker-than-expected inflation figures drove the biggest gains on Wall Street in more than two-and-a-half years.
Key points:
